verbs.description: First lady Melania Trump [V: has] been in the hospital for four days since a procedure to treat a kidney condition , with no word on when she will be released .

[ARG1: First lady Melania Trump] has [V: been] [ARG2: in the hospital] [ARGM-TMP: for four days] [ARGM-TMP: since a procedure to treat a kidney condition] , [ARGM-ADV: with no word on when she will be released] .
[ARG0: First] lady Melania Trump has been in the hospital for four days since a procedure to [V: treat] [ARG2: a kidney condition] , with no word on when she will be released .
First lady Melania Trump has been in the hospital for four days since a procedure to treat a kidney condition , with no word on when she [V: will] be released .
First lady Melania Trump has been in the hospital for four days since a procedure to treat a kidney condition , with no word on when she will [V: be] released .
